pageSetting.title: 管理绩效查询

attribute.value: select lbdh as key, lbmc as value from csb_hylb

col.title: 员工产品营销计价平均薪酬

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select $tjrq$ as tjrq,jglb.lbmc as jglb,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc as hylb,coalesce(hygw.gwmc,'') as gwmc, gljx.khjxjs,gljx.kzxs1 as tjxs,gljx.khjx as gljx from jxgz_gljx gljx inner join KHDX_HY hy on gljx.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join KHDX_JGCY cy on gljx.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hy.khdxdh=hylb.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq left join KHDX_HYGW hygw on hy.khdxdh=hygw.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between hygw.qsrq and hygw.jsrq inner join KHDX_JG jg on cy.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh inner join KHDX_JGLB jglb on jg.khdxdh=jglb.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and gljx.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ and hylb.lbdh='$lbdh$' order by jg.jgdh,hy.hydh

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select $tjrq$ as tjrq,jglb.lbmc as jglb,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc as hylb,coalesce(hygw.gwmc,'') as gwmc, gljx.khjxjs,gljx.kzxs1 as tjxs,gljx.khjx as gljx from jxgz_gljx gljx inner join KHDX_HY hy on gljx.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh inner join KHDX_JGCY cy on gljx.khdxdh=cy.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between cy.qsrq and cy.jsrq inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hy.khdxdh=hylb.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq left join KHDX_HYGW hygw on hy.khdxdh=hygw.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between hygw.qsrq and hygw.jsrq inner join KHDX_JG jg on cy.jgkhdxdh=jg.khdxdh inner join KHDX_JGLB jglb on jg.khdxdh=jglb.khdxdh and $tjrq_ym$ between jglb.qsrq and jglb.jsrq inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QXHY($tjrq_ym$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qxhy on hy.khdxdh=qxhy.khdxdh where 1=1 and hy.khdxdh in ($khdxdh$) and gljx.tjrq=$tjrq_ym$ and hylb.lbdh='$lbdh$' order by jg.jgdh,hy.hydh ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select lbdh as key, lbmc as value from csb_hylb
